FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum number of sources for which IGMP can have local receiver information based on received IGMP reports on this interface. When this configuration is changed dynamically to a value lower than currently accepted number of sources, the sources that are already accepted are not deleted. Only new sources will not be allowed.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of sources for this interface. Values-1 to 1000.
